sense.gloss: nice to meet you, I'm glad to make your acquaintance, how do you do?

sdata.j: キリルと↑申↑↓もう↓します、|↑初↑↓はじ↓めまして|！
sdata.e: My name's Cyril; pleased to meet you!

sdata.e: My name's Cyril. Pleased to meet you.

こんにちは。|↑初↑↓はじ↓めまして|。
sdata.e: Hi! It's nice to meet you.
